344 class AmoebaVdwForce::VdwInfo {
345 public:
346  int parentIndex;
347  double reductionFactor, sigma, epsilon, cutoff;
348  bool isAlchemical;
349  VdwInfo() {
350  parentIndex = -1;
351  reductionFactor = 0.0;
352  sigma = 1.0;
353  epsilon = 0.0;
354  isAlchemical = false;
355  }
356  VdwInfo(int parentIndex, double sigma, double epsilon, double reductionFactor, bool isAlchemical) :
357  parentIndex(parentIndex), reductionFactor(reductionFactor), sigma(sigma), epsilon(epsilon), isAlchemical(isAlchemical) {
358  }
359 };
